Html:
I know that NAudio is still in works to pass all validation issues.

My errors are:
Error Found: The supported APIs test detected the following errors:
      API MFTranscodeGetAudioOutputAvailableTypes in mf.dll is not supported for this application type. NAudio.Win8.dll calls this API.
      API MFTEnumEx in mfplat.dll is not supported for this application type. NAudio.Win8.dll calls this API.
Is there some way to pass the validation somehow?
Basically I'm just using MediaFoundationReader and Pcm16BitToSampleProvider on my project.
So I can get the array of bytes for the audio files.

Thanks in advance!
I've published a new NAudio (1.7.2) to NuGet with an updated Win 8 store DLL. Hopefully this will pass WACK now. Let me know how you get on with it.

Thanks so much!
Will check it out!
